TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit HttpParseException extends System.Web.HttpException
Public NotInheritable Class HttpParseException Inherits HttpException
public ref class HttpParseException sealed : System::Web::HttpException

summary.span: 剖析錯誤發生時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a parse error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是 ASP.NET 可讓輸出剖析器例外狀況資訊的 HTTP 特定例外狀況類別。The class is an HTTP-specific exception class that enables ASP.NET to output parser exception information. 如需有關擲回和處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 例外狀況](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md)。For more information on throwing and handling exceptions, see [Exceptions](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用自訂頁面剖析期間所產生的錯誤。The following example demonstrates how to use the to customize errors generated during page parsing. 在此範例中，自訂控制項所定義。In this example, a customized control is defined. 如果自訂控制項的子項目不是指定的型別就就會擲回中覆寫方法的自訂。If child elements of the custom control are not of a specified type then an is thrown in the overridden method of a custom . 若要產生剖析例外狀況，變更的常值的子項目`MyCustomOption`任何其他字串。To generate a parse exception, change the child element literal `MyCustomOption` to any other string. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpParseException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpParseException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/vb/source.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpParseException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HttpParseException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/vb/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The physical path to the source file that is being parsed when the error occurs; otherwise, , if the physical path is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回錯誤，除非是實體路徑的原始程式檔的實體路徑`null`，它會傳回在此情況下`null`。The property returns the physical path to the source file that has the error unless the physical path is `null`, in which case it returns `null`.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用例外狀況的資訊設定 物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sets the object with information about the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定以序列化為目標的所有例外狀況物件資料的物件。The method sets a object with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 還原序列化期間，例外狀況是從資料流上傳輸的 SerializationInfo 重新組成。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the SerializationInfo transmitted over the stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義衍生可序列化可實作類別方法，它會對兩個屬性進行次要變更，然後再呼叫基底類別進行序列化。The following code example shows how to define a derived serializable class that implements the method, which makes minor changes to two properties, and then calls the base class to perform the serialization. 此範例會強制以除以-0 的錯誤，並接著會建立衍生的執行個體。The example forces a divide-by-0 error, and then creates an instance of the derived . 程式碼將序列化至檔案的執行個體、 將檔案還原序列化新，它會擲回，然後會攔截並顯示例外狀況的資料。The code serializes the instance to a file, deserializes the file into a new , which it throws, and then catches and displays the exception's data. [!code-cpp[System.Exception.GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Exception.GetObjectData/CPP/getobjdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Exception.GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Exception.GetObjectData/CS/getobjdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Exception.GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Exception.GetObjectData/VB/getobjdata.vb#1)]
